Class CodeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Adapters.CodeAdapter

  • public class CodeAdapter
extends <any>
    This class provides data and manages the codes recycler view.

        public void showSettings(int position)
        This method starts the CodeSettingsActivity.
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the code in the code's list to be edited.

      • filter

        public void filter(java.lang.String filterText)
        This method filters the code based on the filterText, this can be used to search among codes.
        Parameters:
        filterText - the base text of the filtering.
